summary.content: My Movable Type installation seems to have broken. I can’t rebuild anything without getting a 500 error, and nobody can post any comments either. I’ve posted for help on the MT support forums, but to no avail. Has anyone else had a problem like this? Has anybody got the answer? I won’t be able to post anymore until I get this fixed. =( If anyone has any ideas, please contact me!

content.html:
My Movable Type installation seems to have broken. I can’t rebuild anything without getting a 500 error, and nobody can post any comments either.

I’ve posted for help on the MT support forums, but to no avail. Has anyone else had a problem like this? Has anybody got the answer? I won’t be able to post anymore until I get this fixed. =(

If anyone has any ideas, please contact me!

content.source:
My [Movable Type]({{% wayback "http://www.movabletype.org" %}}) installation seems to have broken. I can’t rebuild anything without getting a 500 error, and nobody can post any comments either.

I’ve posted for help on the [MT support forums]({{% wayback "http://www.movabletype.org/support/index.php?act=ST&f=10&t=32326&s=8732afdb22c3b4bb50669d69e9f27448" %}}), but to no avail. Has anyone else had a problem like this? Has anybody got the answer? I won’t be able to post anymore until I get this fixed. =(

If anyone has any ideas, please [contact me](/contact/)!
